document.full_text: the national transportation safety board will conduct a review of the safety system governing the discount tour bus industry in the wake of last month's deadly bronx bus crash that killed 15 passengers, authorities announced on sunday.
document.title: ntsb to review discount bus safety after new york crash
lines_and_colors: the national transportation safety board will conduct a review of the safety system governing the discount tour bus industry in the wake of last month's deadly bronx bus crash that killed 15 passengers, authorities announced on sunday.
